00019 #ifndef _POSIX_SEM_H
00020 #define _POSIX_SEM_H
00021 
00022 #include <posix/thread.h>       /* For pse51_current_thread and
00023                                    pse51_thread_t definition. */
00024 
00025 /* Must be called nklock locked, irq off. */
00026 unsigned long pse51_usem_open(struct __shadow_sem *sem,
00027                               struct mm_struct *mm,
00028                               unsigned long uaddr);
00029 
00030 /* Must be called nklock locked, irq off. */
00031 int pse51_usem_close(struct __shadow_sem *sem, struct mm_struct *mm);
00032 
00033 void pse51_sem_pkg_init(void);
00034 
00035 void pse51_sem_pkg_cleanup(void);
00036 
00037 #endif /* !_POSIX_SEM_H */
